official_title: An mHealth Strategy to Improve Medication Adherence in Adolescents With Sickle Cell Disease
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 12-21 years old
* Any sickle cell disease genotype
* On steady state of hydroxyurea for 2 months
* Own of have access to a smartphone during the study period
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
Must have maximum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Recent hospitalizations within the past 7 days
